com.vdisk.android

类 VDiskAuthSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vdisk.net.session.AbstractSession
      • com.vdisk.android.VDiskAuthSession
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Session

    public class VDiskAuthSession
extends AbstractSession
    Keeps track of a logged in user and contains configuration options for the VDiskAPI. Has methods specific to Android for authenticating users via the VDisk app or web site.

    A typical authentication flow when no user access token pair is saved is as follows: 
     VDiskAuthSession session = new VDiskAuthSession(myAppKeys, myAccessType);
 
 When a user returns to your app and you have tokens stored, just create a
 new session with them:
 
    
 
 
     VDiskAuthSession session = new VDiskAuthSession(myAppKeys, myAccessType,
                new AccessToken(storedAccessKey, storedAccessSecret));
    作者:
    sina

      • buildSession

        private static VDiskAuthSession buildSession(Context ctx,
                            AppKeyPair appKeyPair,
                            Session.AccessType type)
        创建一个Session对象。如果本地已经保存了AccessToken，就创建一个带有AccessToken的Session对象。 如果没有保存，就创建一个无AccessToken的Session对象。 Create a instance of Session. If there is a AccessToken saved in local, create a instance of Session having AccessToken. Otherwise, create a instance of Session without AccessToken.
        参数:
        ctx -
        appKeyPair -
        type -
        返回:

      • getOAuth2AccessToken

        public AccessToken getOAuth2AccessToken(Context context,
                               String usrname,
                               String password)
                                 throws VDiskException
        使用用户名和密码直接获取AccessToken(限于某些高级权限的应用). Use username and password to get AccessToken directly(limited to some applications with advanced permission).
        参数:
        context -
        usrname - 用户名
        password - 密码
        返回:
        抛出:
        VDiskException

      • refreshOAuth2AccessToken

        public AccessToken refreshOAuth2AccessToken(String refreshToken,
                                   Context ctx)
                                     throws VDiskException
        AccessToken失效后，使用RefreshToken进行刷新(限于某些高级权限的应用). After AccessToken become invalid, use RefreshToken to do refreshing(limited to some applications with advanced permission).
        参数:
        refreshToken -
        ctx -
        返回:
        抛出:
        VDiskException
